settings.heading: WHAT'S SO SPECIAL ABOUT AFGHAN RUGS?
settings.content:
Afghan rugs are celebrated worldwide for their:

  • Timeless Designs: Mesmerizing patterns and motifs combining ancient geometric shapes and stylized elements.
  • Finest Materials: Crafted from hand-spun, premium-quality wool renowned for softness and vibrant, long-lasting colors.
  • Enduring Quality: Meticulous construction and superior materials ensure they withstand time, remaining cherished heirlooms.
  • Ethical and Sustainable: Supporting skilled artisans, preserving cultural heritage, and sustaining local communities.

settings.heading: Do you offer custom sizes or designs for Afghan rugs?
settings.content:
We can bring your specific size or design vision to life!

  • Personalized Consultation: We'll work with you from design selection to finalizing dimensions and colors.
  • Handcrafted Quality: Custom orders may require additional time, as each rug is meticulously handcrafted to your specifications.

settings.heading: Why buy from Chargul?
settings.content:
When you purchase an Afghan rug from Chargul, you can expect:

  • Ethical Sourcing: We source directly from Afghan weavers, ensuring fair compensation and supporting local communities.
  • High-Quality Materials: Our rugs are made from premium wool and natural dyes for durability and vibrant colors.
  • Authenticity: Each hand-knotted rug is a genuine piece of Afghan heritage, crafted by skilled artisans.
  • Wide Selection: Choose from a diverse range of designs, sizes, and colors to suit your taste and decor.
  • Customer Support: Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you, ensuring a smooth shopping experience.

settings.heading: What is your shipping policy?
settings.content:
• Shipping Time: Within the US, expect your rug to arrive in 3-5 business days. International orders may take 1-3 weeks.
  • Shipping Costs: Enjoy free shipping on all orders within the United States.
  • Order Tracking: We provide a tracking number via email, allowing you to monitor your shipment's progress.

settings.heading: What is your return and exchange policy?
settings.content:
• Returns: We offer a 30-day return policy for a full refund, provided the item is in its original condition.
  • Refunds: Once we receive the returned rug, we process refunds within 5 business days.
  • Exchanges: Take advantage of our 30-day exchange policy if you prefer a different rug.
